--- title: "Week 1 Demo: Interactive Workflow" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Introduction This demo showcases the interactive workflow for ECON 2B03. - **Webexercises**: Fill-in-the-blank, multiple choice, true/false - **Quarto-Quiz**: Interactive multiple choice with check button - **Master-Only Content**: Hidden cues for the instructor - **Placeholders**: Slido & Microsoft Forms --- # Webexercises Demo --- ## Fill-in-the-blank Create fill-in-the-blank questions using `fitb()`. - 2 + 2 is ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} x <- sample(2:8, 1) ``` ::: - The square root of 49 is: - What is the letter after D? ::: {.notes} Students see instant feedback: green for correct, red for incorrect. ::: --- ## Multiple choice - Which is a measure of central tendency? - "Never gonna give you up, never gonna: " --- ## True or false - True or False? You can permute values in a vector using `sample()`. - True or False? The mean is always greater than the median. --- ## Longer MCQs **What is a p-value?** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} opts_p <- c( "the probability that the null hypothesis is true", answer = "the probability of the observed, or more extreme, data, under the assumption that the null-hypothesis is true", "the probability of making an error in your conclusion" ) ``` :::
--- # Quarto-Quiz Demo --- ## Quarto-Quiz (Quick Check) {.quiz-question} Which statement is true? - The mean is always the median - [A symmetric distribution has mean = median]{.correct data-explanation="For symmetric distributions, the mean and median coincide."} - Variance can be negative - A sample is always the full population --- ## Quarto-Quiz (Multi-Select) {.quiz-question .quiz-multiple} Select all that apply. - [The mean is a measure of central tendency]{.correct data-explanation="The mean summarizes central location."} - [The median is robust to outliers]{.correct data-explanation="The median resists extreme values."} - Variance can be negative - [The standard deviation is the square root of variance]{.correct data-explanation="Standard deviation is sqrt(variance), which is non-negative."} --- ## Quarto-Quiz (True/False) {.quiz-question} The sample mean is an unbiased estimator of the population mean. - [True]{.correct data-explanation="The expected value of the sample mean equals the population mean."} - False --- ## Quarto-Quiz (Single Choice) {.quiz-question} Which term refers to the most frequent value? - Mean - Median - Variance - [Mode]{.correct data-explanation="The mode is the most frequent value."} --- ## Quarto-Quiz (Ordering) {.quiz-question} Order these steps for a basic hypothesis test. 1. State the null and alternative hypotheses 2. Choose a significance level 3. Compute the test statistic 4. Compare to a critical value (or compute a p-value) 5. Draw a conclusion --- ## Quarto-Quiz Demo {.quiz-question} Which probability distribution is symmetric? - Chi-square - F-distribution - [Normal distribution]{.correct data-explanation="The Normal distribution is symmetric around its mean."} - Exponential ::: {.master-only} ‚è±Ô∏è **Wait 2 minutes** | Teaching Cue: Ask for examples of real-world normal distributions. ::: --- ## Slido Placeholder ::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Vote Here *(Slido Embed Placeholder)* [Link to poll](https://example.com/) ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} ### Live Results *(Slido Results Placeholder)* ::: ::: ::: {.master-only} üî¥ **ACTIVATE POLL #1 NOW** ::: --- ## Forms Placeholder ### Participation Credit **Due Today by 11:59 PM** [Microsoft Forms Placeholder Link](https://example.com/) *(QR Code Image Placeholder)* Enter the secret code from today's lecture: **NORMAL** ::: {.master-only} Ensure form is open and accepting responses. :::
